original_title: Alejandro Sanz: El Alma Al Aire - Live - Vicente Calderón Stadium - June 28th 2001
overview: El Alma al Aire is the fifth studio album recorded by Spanish singer-songwriter Alejandro Sanz in which he gives us interpretations that come from the soul, melodies in which it seems that the voice breaks. It is one of his more suggestive and emotive works. It beat all the records of sale of the Spanish market on having reached the 1,000,000 copies in the first week.
title: Alejandro Sanz: El Alma Al Aire - Live - Vicente Calderón Stadium - June 28th 2001
